title: New champion select is trash.
body:
> Get mid 3 times in a row
> Someone dodges 3 times in a row
> Get jungle
> Player gets triggered
> Player trolls

Please bring back team builder.

How can anyone enjoy this game anymore.

replies.body: your issue is with player mindsets, and how people dodged constantly. that isnt the selections fault. those are player based choices off something they couldnt fully control. sometimes you get what you want, sometimes you dont. teambuilder let you get what you wanted but whichever system is in place, it is the player mindset that dictates player behavior. 3 dodges were someone elses decision not the systems, them going through queue 4 times was someone else making a decision and the decision to troll was theirs and theirs alone.
Maybe you need to work on your master yi mechanics (^:

Teambuilder had way, way more trolls..

Do you remember duo top, support lee sin, and the 25 minute wait times?

What does dodging and trolls even have to do with DQ?
